nodes.text: R3-D5 was an R3 series astromech droid that saw operation during the Clone Wars. The droid was assigned to Saesee Tiin's starfighter and saw combat over Lola Sayu during a dangerous mission.

R3-D5 first appeared in the Clone Wars episode "Citadel Rescue", an episode from the third season of the series. LEGO later included the droid as a minifigure in the set 9498 Saesee Tiin's Jedi Starfighter.
